whyChooseDesc: Krishi is designed with a farmer-first approach, offering all essential services like smart farming tools, expert advice, booking of vehicles/equipment, and a B2B store in one easy-to-use platform. It‚Äôs simple, reliable, and accessible even in rural areas with low internet. We help farmers connect directly with buyers, eliminate middlemen, and ensure better pricing and transparency. Our platform is trusted by both farmers and buyers for its convenience, support, and real-world impact.
